text: Wajahat Habibullah (born 30 September 1945) is an Indian politician. He was the chairperson of the National Commission for Minorities. He was the first Chief Information Commissioner of India. He was an officer of the Indian Administrative Service (IAS) from 1968 until his retirement in August 2005.Backwoods Babus | Anjali Puri He also was the Administrator of Lakshadweep from 1987 to 1990. ==References== Category:1945 births Category:Living people Category:Administrators of Lakshadweep
title: Wajahat Habibullah
